title: Singed Guy is Getting Rightfully Penalized

embed.description: looking for gold to diamond people to queue with bot lane so rito doesn't suspend my account again. you can go adc or some bruiser like volibear or yasuo. convo with a rito employee: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5cyde6/3_million_mastery_smite_support_singed_ama_and/

body:
EDIT!!!!!!! People are going and telling him to kill himself in the comments on his youtube. DO NOT DO THIS, EVER. He doesn't deserve this for playing the game in a really dumb way and if you are reading this after leaving him a comment you are 100x worse. I deleted a youtube link since people were doing that. I meant this to be like an opinion thread, NOT A WITCH HUNT. 

Lets look at the game I linked (one that went well enough which he decides to showcase it, so this is literally best case scenario) to see whats up. 

At 4:00 (game time), singed comes to bot lane for the first time. His adc draven has only 5 cs, is 10% hp, and attempting to not get tower dived and get some farm. While the adc is farming at 10% hp, singed stands directly behind him at full hp. He moves further behind draven to avoid ashe w poke, letting the low hp, no farm adc tank it for him. Ashe gets greedy and tries to kill draven under tower and manages to die.

Around 17:00, singed overtakes his adc in farm, who has nearly half the farm of ashe. His bot lanes turret was the first turret to fall. Note that akali has 8 kills for his team. 

27:00, singed has only participated in ONE kill, with no assists, no deaths. His only kill is ashe committing suicide under tower. His adc now has less farm than both junglers. His Akali now has 11 kills. Hecarim is getting items and now lots of kills too. The score reaches 20:25 before singed gets his 3rd kill participation

Remember this is best case where they won the game, thanks to a fed af hecarim and akali. Singed does not die the entire game because he does not participate with the team. Now I want you to picture the games that are lost, and how that makes his teammates feel especially the adc. Look at how bad his adc did trying to solo lane in a game that they actually won and _even killed the enemy adc at lv3._

**If you ignore the game, your team and the role you queued as, get banned.** and if you think otherwise, picture this:

Someone queues as jungle, they don't take smite, choose draven, then roam mid/top and just take farm without ever fighting any enemies. Would you report them for trolling? Would you be pissed? I would be, almost everyone would be, and that's why this guy is getting banned all the time. He is a detriment to his team in every way, from screwing the adc to ignoring the rest of the fights. Regardless of if he gets some really fed solo laners to win along side, this is against summoners code and must piss off virtually every team he plays with.

Video #2, they lose and pretty bad. His entire team is mad, mostly at him for what he does.** He then reports his entire team for intentional feeding, harassment and unsportsmanlike conduct.** The enemy team apologizes in post game lobby for his trolling on their team.

replies.body: Gotta be honest, kill participation is pretty bad throughout the game, his strategy revolves around his team being able to fight a 4v5 while he just farms all game, furthermore he forces his ADC to fight a 1v2 which is utterly absurd in so many cases.
Well if the team fights 4v5... he will destroy the enemy base with ZZrot minions and Banner minion (he doesn't even necessarily have to be there)

All the while destroying his ADC in farm and exp if his opponent is good enough to freeze the wave and zone the opponent from it, you'd be lucky if your team wins a 4v5 like that. He's just relying on his team to basically carry him where as he's not really contributing all that much.

Here's the thing. whether or not it makes logical sense is irrelevant. You might not like what I'm about to say and I might get dislike bombed but, according to the rules as they are now he shouldn't be banned. So no, he doesn't deserve this until Riot changes the rules to address this, end of discussion.
He should get baned, he breaks the rules.

This does not make it right or is counted as communication.

I can also do the same, i will write a paragraph about how i play 6 boots teemo support.

This does not make what i am doing right, and when i ignore my team that says to not do it (Just like the troll) And i STILL do it, that counts as refusing to communicate.
Playing with this guy must be an absolutely miserable experience for any adc.

That depends a lot on what the ADC is playing... like Ezeral or Cait could possibly manage fine enough (especially if against Tristana or just someone who pushes into the tower instead of freezing and denying since the ADC can't walk up while it is 2v1)

You really cant understand how a semidecent suport can make the life of the adc hell in 2v1. Even Cait. Ez is bad example for 1v2 as he doesnt have clear and he will lose tower really fast and get outrotated.

This strategy is totally viable... IF YOUR ENTIRE TEAM AGREES TO IT AND THE TEAM COMP IS ADJUSTED ACCORDINGLY. 

Don't queue for support and then double jungle/counterjungle. That's not what you queued for so you sure as hell should be punished for doing it. It completely ruins the experience for your 4 other teammates.
So he's banned... for breaking meta?

Yes, breaking the meta.

And causing a 3v5 game for every team he encounters, based on what I can tell on youtube here.

Play csgo and sit in the corner until your team either wins or dies entirely. Then try to win from there, but with only dual pistols. Do they 4v5 and win sometimes? Yes. Do you sometimes even win the round alone? Maybe. But are you basically trolling, pissing off literally everyone you meet to the point that you should be banned for ruining their games and experience? Yup

EDIT: I guess this example isnt perfect because your team would just kick you from the game. But the idea is there lol
So punish someone because they have a different play-style that you don't agree with? The ruining games and experience is a two way street so you mine as well toss that argument out the window.

It's not a simple 2 way street. He ruins the game for 4 people at a time, negatively effecting the games of many many players. While if he deemed his games ruined from being forced to not play this style, that's just one guy

"we are going to toss this innocent guy to rot because most of the time it happens"

Assuming he actually ruins games for people

Now, why should he have to change his style to fit another persons opinion?



Maybe he dislikes seeing the current meta and plays his own. Punish someone because he's meta breaking is stupid, "game-ruining" experience is an opinionated statement and can be so far-fetched to fit anything.

It is not an assumption to say he ruins the experience for people. Watch his videos and keep an eye on chat. People get right pissed, even in the ones they win. In lobby they are usually still mad and either flaming or talking with the other team about his bullshit. Then he opens the stats and in one game he had 3600 damage in a _game they WON_. With again, the lowest kill participation in the entire game.

He isn't off meta. He is way way past the reasonable range of allowable things which "off meta" contains. He is doing all the actions which trolls do, and get the same results that trolls do. Only difference is, in his mind he isn't trolling. The effect on his team is nearly the same, which is that everyone gets mad and has their experience ruined

He is controling the resources

Something Low elo people dont understand

Having Good KDA and KP Dmg DEALT To champions arent the only ways you can influence the game

At the expense of pressure on his designated role's lane opponents and at the expense of his marksman's success.
